feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.6.22
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 1970311ff5e3bcf26ab832ddfb009a9b119cc4e6 feat: Triggered actions get previous action args #607 (#611)

Others

  • 433456986dc7a0e738e33c2790126a3df2716e58 fix: #603 - Dashboards that have fieldsets without entities are hidden (#609)
  • e38361f3d7550f511364fcc9bff4ab5693b7cff9 fix: gofmt/gocylo leftover from old PR (#610)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.6.22

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.6.22

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.7.13

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.7.19
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • e922baa2e09de9628c1b3df6ffe8e6af7bb20927 feat: #104 Checkboxes / booleans at last! (#620)
  • fcd1879d093782b682d61093a95c251d7038cb45 feat: Entities in icon field, and other cleanup stuff (#619)
  • b91c0d7e45ccf96a117c1db458cd6e5194bf45eb feat: Style update for buttons, reduce style duplication (#621)

Bug fixes

  • af75afa82f6be0f2d45fd6b1aebd855fe43325b8 bugfix: #401 Duplicate lines in output (#623)

Others

  • a8ac719af7da040e1ee26515cf7e876b65ff5a25 feat kill acl (#618)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.7.19

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.7.29
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • a06299bd9ef5df3ef894cc7db581a58273a401b7 feature: stylemods, for side by side buttons, and XL images (#634)

Bug fixes

  • d4d3193c1d44e45f0a5f3f9563bd79bea40b98d4 bugfix: Argument confirmations stopped working (#627) (#632)
  • 2d4a3fc04814b3132b540df0c415072e3e2e7adc bugfix: Crash in OAuth2 userdata, and option to log user data (#631)

Others

  • 10e5a92cbe2e3b516f4dd64670b4148f2f5d75a9 build(deps): bump github.com/docker/docker from 28.3.1+incompatible to 28.3.3+incompatible in /service (#635)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.7.29

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.7.29

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.
